author: mratsim
content:
I've used that book to implement my own so if you have questions feel free.

See:

- sage code to derive the endomorphisms constants https://github.com/mratsim/constantine/blob/master/sage/derive_endomorphisms.sage
- A bit more clear, the lattice decomposition finder without all the fluff surrounding code https://github.com/mratsim/constantine/commit/ac37b55aa134f8adacc4df306dc905e11875af86 (deleted, replaced by something generic)
- Lattice decomposition for BLS12-381 https://github.com/mratsim/constantine/blob/ac37b55/sage/lattice_decomposition_bls12_381_g1.sage (deleted later once working)

author: mratsim
content: One pitfall that made me lose time. endomorphism acceleration only works on points in the correct subgroup, so don't forget to clear the cofactor when testing.

author: mratsim
content:
also I don't remember which one, but one of the lattice they gave for BLS was incorrect hence why I derived my own.

Appendix A of this paper https://eprint.iacr.org/2014/401.pdf was also very helpful
